page.title: 02One day in a familys life
page.content: When my mum wakes up she feels very sleepy and wonders what day it is.She hopes it's Saturday or Sunday so she does'nt have to go to work.My dad gets up very early and has a wash and gets dressed and has his breakfast ready to go to work.My brother is always in a bad mood when he wakes up.I sleepyly get up,have a wash and get dressed and then my breakfast.My mum gets ready and goes to work.My dad goes to work very early.My brother goes to school.I walk to scool.My mum comes home at 12:00 and has her lunch.My dad comes home about 5:30 and has his tea.My brother comes home from school and plays with our kitten.I walk home from school and also play with the kitten.My brother and I watch T.V. and have our tea.Soon it is time to go to bed.
